title: A Sense of touch
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Senses and sensation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Touch
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Vision
description: The evocative images in this film stimulate associations between visual and tactile information. Vivid close-ups of sensuous activities such as licking a popsicle, stroking a beard and walking barefoot in the grass encourage the viewer to explore the tactile properties of objects using different parts of the body. The sound track consists of music without words, which provides pacing and highlights the nature of different sensory experiences.
